description: Phase 1: Normalize CSS spacing and visual hierarchy across all Command Center tabs. IMPORTANT: Code is at ventus-voice/frontend/src/ (NOT root frontend/).

userStories.title: Normalize EarsTab AccordionContent spacing to consistent space-y-4 pt-2
userStories.description: As a user, I want consistent vertical spacing between form sections in the Ears tab so it matches other tabs.
acceptanceCriteria: IMPORTANT: Code is at ventus-voice/frontend/src/ (NOT root frontend/)
In EarsTab.tsx (ventus-voice/frontend/src/components/CommandCenter/tabs/EarsTab.tsx), find ALL AccordionContent elements
Ensure every AccordionContent className includes 'space-y-4 pt-2' consistently
Specifically fix: Custom Vocabulary section — change space-y-3 to space-y-4
Specifically fix: Accent Hints section — add space-y-4 (currently only pt-2 with no space-y)
Specifically fix: Noise Cancellation section — add space-y-4 (currently only pt-2 with no space-y)
Specifically fix: Fallback Transcribers section — change space-y-3 to space-y-4
Do NOT change the internal card spacing (p-3 space-y-3 inside VocabCard/FallbackItem is fine — only fix the AccordionContent wrapper)
Files: ventus-voice/frontend/src/components/CommandCenter/tabs/EarsTab.tsx
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Fixed 4 AccordionContent sections: Custom Vocabulary space-y-3→space-y-4, Accent Hints added space-y-4, Noise Cancellation added space-y-4, Fallback Transcribers space-y-3→space-y-4. All now consistently use 'space-y-4 pt-2'.

userStories.title: Normalize fallback item padding across Voice and Ears tabs
userStories.description: As a user, I want fallback voice/transcriber rows to have consistent padding across tabs.
acceptanceCriteria: IMPORTANT: Code is at ventus-voice/frontend/src/ (NOT root frontend/)
In VoiceTab.tsx (ventus-voice/frontend/src/components/CommandCenter/tabs/VoiceTab.tsx), find the fallback voice row elements
Change fallback voice row from 'flex items-center gap-2 p-2 border rounded' to 'flex items-center gap-3 p-3 rounded-lg border border-border bg-background' to match EarsTab fallback styling
This normalizes: p-2 gap-2 border rounded → p-3 gap-3 rounded-lg border border-border bg-background
Files: ventus-voice/frontend/src/components/CommandCenter/tabs/VoiceTab.tsx
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Changed VoiceTab fallback voice row from 'flex items-center gap-2 p-2 border rounded' to 'flex items-center gap-3 p-3 rounded-lg border border-border bg-background' matching EarsTab FallbackItem styling.

userStories.title: Normalize grid gaps to consistent gap-3 across Voice and Ears tabs
userStories.description: As a user, I want consistent grid spacing for voice cards and provider cards.
acceptanceCriteria: IMPORTANT: Code is at ventus-voice/frontend/src/ (NOT root frontend/)
In VoiceTab.tsx, find the voice selector grid (grid grid-cols-2 gap-2) and change gap-2 to gap-3
Verify EarsTab provider card grids already use gap-3 (if gap-2 found, change to gap-3)
Search all tab files in ventus-voice/frontend/src/components/CommandCenter/tabs/ for 'gap-2' in grid contexts and normalize to gap-3
Do NOT change gap-2 inside flex layouts (like flex gap-2 for inline badge groups) — only normalize grid layouts
Files: ventus-voice/frontend/src/components/CommandCenter/tabs/VoiceTab.tsx, ventus-voice/frontend/src/components/CommandCenter/tabs/EarsTab.tsx
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Add SectionBadge hints to BrainTab, VoiceTab, EarsTab accordion triggers
userStories.description: As a user, I want consistent visual hierarchy badges on section headers across all tabs, matching the BehaviorTab pattern.
acceptanceCriteria: IMPORTANT: Code is at ventus-voice/frontend/src/ (NOT root frontend/)
BehaviorTab.tsx already has a SectionBadge pattern: hint text inside AccordionTrigger

Add similar SectionBadge hints to key AccordionTrigger elements in BrainTab.tsx — add badge text: Provider section → provider+model name, Intelligence section → temperature value, System Prompt section → token count
Add similar SectionBadge hints to VoiceTab.tsx — Provider section → selected provider, Voice section → selected voice name, Tuning section → speed value
Add similar SectionBadge hints to EarsTab.tsx — Provider section → selected provider, Language section → selected language, Recognition section → accuracy mode
The badge should show a short summary of current selection, placed inside <AccordionTrigger> after the label text
Use the exact same className as BehaviorTab: 'text-xs bg-[hsl(var(--surface-elevated))] text-[hsl(var(--text-muted))] px-2 py-0.5 rounded-full ml-auto'

Files: ventus-voice/frontend/src/components/CommandCenter/tabs/BrainTab.tsx, ventus-voice/frontend/src/components/CommandCenter/tabs/VoiceTab.tsx, ventus-voice/frontend/src/components/CommandCenter/tabs/EarsTab.tsx
Typecheck passes
